Type Conversion Between Tcl and ECLiPSe

The EXDR (ECLiPSe External Data Representation, see chapter 9) representation is fully supported by the interface. The same type conversions commands as in the embedding Tcl interface, described in section 5.7 (ec_write_exdr, ec_read_exdr, ec_tcl2exdr, ec_exdr2tcl), are available.


Warwick Harvey
2005-01-25
